mapper.insert: insert into board(bd_title, bd_contents, bd_reg_date, bd_type,bd_me_id, bd_ori_num, bd_del) select #{board.bd_title}, #{board.bd_contents}, now(), #{board.bd_type}, #{board.bd_me_id}, ifnull(max(bd_num),0)+1, 'N' from board;
mapper.select: select * from board where bd_type = #{type} and bd_del = 'N' order by bd_num desc
select * from board where bd_num = #{bd_num} and bd_del = 'N'
mapper.update: update board set bd_del ='Y', bd_del_date = now() where bd_num = #{bd_num}
